item.description: What could be better than watching the AFC Championship game, then enjoy Sunday night Karaoke at the Rosebud. Due to the Start time of the AFC Championship Game, Karaoke will get a later start approximately 9:30pm on Sunday rather than out regular start time of 8pm.We would like you to join us for the game at 6pm and then we can celebrate a big Pats win and their next stop the Superbowl. So come rock your hearts out with us Sunday at 6pm. Great place to catch the game, IT will be displayed on all the TV in the bar, and the game sound will be pumped thru the sound system, so you won't miss any of the action. Unlike some of those busy bars where you can watch the game, but don't necessarily get to hear the game play. Great football food, nachos, wings, pizza and more.....Cold beer to quench your thirst.... Come on down...Don't forget Monday Jan 21st may also be a holiday for some as well, so hoping for a great turnout for Karaoke, get there early for the game and get your song requests in for karaoke early.....
item.name: AFC Championship Game & Karaoke Lets Go Pats!!!!!!
